articles.title: Missing Cape Town man found dead after nine-day search - TimesLIVE
articles.description: Gus Thompson, the father of former South African Olympic-medallist rower James Thompson, was found dead on Chapmans Peak in Cape Town on Saturday, more than a week after he disappeared from a frail-care facility in Noordhoek.
